extDescription.message: Attach website content to AI chatbots as files

subtitle.message: Quickly attach content to AI chatbots

cmdWebsiteDesc.message: Attach page HTML as a file

cmdWebsiteTextDesc.message: Attach page text as a file

hintShortcut.message: Press Cmd+. (or Ctrl+.) to open the command palette.

hintFirefox.message: To open the palette from the main tab with Cmd+.: about:addons → Gear → Extension shortcuts → assign Ctrl+. to "Open command palette".

toastAttachNotSupported.message: File attachment is not supported on this site yet

errorSourceTabNotFound.message: Source tab not found. Please open a web page.

authOverlayDesc.message: The login page has been opened in a new tab. Please complete the login and close the tab — this page will reload automatically.
